data.message:
This is going around... Is it true.
I thought it was a hoax at first but saw this on Good Morning America and the news so I'll share for a shot at it....
THANK YOU, MARK ZUCKERBERG, for your forward-thinking generosity! And congrats on becoming a dad!
Mark Zuckerberg has announced that he is giving away $45 billion of Facebook stock. What you may not have heard is that he plans to give 10% of it away to people like YOU and ME! All you have to do is copy and paste this message into a post IMMEDIATELY. At midnight PST, Facebook will search through the day's posts and award 1000 people with $4.5 million EACH as a way of saying thank you for making Facebook such a powerful vehicle for connection.

replies.message: Hey there, Mike. Thanks for checking in with us. This campaign is a known hoax. If you see content like this on Facebook, please report it to us as spam by using these tips from our Help Center: http://on.fb.me/1NVObor. Thanks. -Kate
This post is still going around. Would be nice to know the actual day this is/has happened Facebook. Thanks so much!
Alberto Camarena sorry to burst ur bubble
The old saying if it sounds to good to be true then it probably is
If this and HOAX then why you guys let this person put it on Facebook........than

Okay I've been getting contacted by a person on FB named Crystal Lawrence, She told me I have won a gift and using Mark Elliot Zuckerberg lovely gift as spam I think. She asks you several questions and then tells you Fedex will deliver money or cash if you pay for services first...and its insured....She also use a woman's name on FB to try and confirm story...Felicia Milan so watch out I don't think these guys are LEGIT!!!
